00016 // wxWidgets headers

00018 #include <wx/listctrl.h>

00020 
00021 #if wxUSE_CHECKEDLISTCTRL
00022 
00023 // image indexes (used internally by wxCheckedListCtrl)
00024 #define wxCLC_UNCHECKED_IMGIDX                          0               // unchecked & enabled
00025 #define wxCLC_CHECKED_IMGIDX                            1               // checked & enabled
00026 #define wxCLC_DISABLED_UNCHECKED_IMGIDX         2               // unchecked & disabled
00027 #define wxCLC_DISABLED_CHECKED_IMGIDX           3               // checked & disabled
00028 
00029 // additional state flags (wx's defines should end at 0x0100; see listbase.h)
00030 #define wxLIST_STATE_CHECKED                            0x010000
00031 #define wxLIST_STATE_ENABLED                            0x100000
00032 
00033 // additional wxCheckedListCtrl style flags
00034 // (wx's defines should at 0x8000; see listbase.h)
00035 #define wxCLC_CHECK_WHEN_SELECTING                      0x10000
00036 
00037 
00038 // -------------------------
00039 // wxCheckedListCtrl events
00040 // -------------------------
00041 
00042 DECLARE_EXPORTED_EVENT_TYPE(WXDLLIMPEXP_WEBUPDATE, wxEVT_COMMAND_LIST_ITEM_CHECKED, -1);
00043 DECLARE_EXPORTED_EVENT_TYPE(WXDLLIMPEXP_WEBUPDATE, wxEVT_COMMAND_LIST_ITEM_UNCHECKED, -1);
00044 
00045 #define EVT_LIST_ITEM_CHECKED(id, fn) \
00046     DECLARE_EVENT_TABLE_ENTRY( \
00047         wxEVT_COMMAND_LIST_ITEM_CHECKED, id, -1, \
00048         (wxObjectEventFunction)(wxEventFunction)(wxListEventFunction)&fn, \
00049         (wxObject *) NULL \
00050     ),
00051 
00052 #define EVT_LIST_ITEM_UNCHECKED(id, fn) \
00053     DECLARE_EVENT_TABLE_ENTRY( \
00054         wxEVT_COMMAND_LIST_ITEM_UNCHECKED, id, -1, \
00055         (wxObjectEventFunction)(wxEventFunction)(wxListEventFunction)&fn, \
00056         (wxObject *) NULL \
00057     ),

00063 class WXDLLIMPEXP_WEBUPDATE wxCheckedListCtrl : public wxListCtrl
00064 {
00065 protected:
00066         
00067         // we have to keep a different array to keep track of the additional
00068         // states we support....
00069         wxArrayInt m_stateList;
00070 
00071         // our set of checkbox images...
00072         wxImageList m_imageList;
00073 
00074 public:
00075         wxCheckedListCtrl()
00076                 : wxListCtrl(), m_imageList(16, 16, TRUE) {}
00077 
00078         wxCheckedListCtrl(wxWindow *parent, wxWindowID id = -1, 
00079                                                 const wxPoint& pt = wxDefaultPosition,
00080                                                 const wxSize& sz = wxDefaultSize, 
00081                                                 long style = wxCLC_CHECK_WHEN_SELECTING,
00082                                                 const wxValidator& validator = wxDefaultValidator, 
00083                                                 const wxString& name = wxListCtrlNameStr)
00084                                                 : wxListCtrl(), m_imageList(16, 16, TRUE)
00085                 { Create(parent, id, pt, sz, style, validator, name); }
00086         
00087         bool Create(wxWindow *parent, wxWindowID id = -1, 
00088                                                 const wxPoint& pt = wxDefaultPosition,
00089                                                 const wxSize& sz = wxDefaultSize, 
00090                                                 long style = wxCLC_CHECK_WHEN_SELECTING,
00091                                                 const wxValidator& validator = wxDefaultValidator, 
00092                                                 const wxString& name = wxListCtrlNameStr);
00093 
00094         virtual ~wxCheckedListCtrl() {}
00095 
00096 
00097 public:                 // utilities
00098 
00099         // core overloads (i.e. the most generic overloads)
00100         bool GetItem(wxListItem& info) const;
00101         bool SetItem(wxListItem& info);
00102     long InsertItem(wxListItem& info);
00103         bool DeleteItem(long item);     
00104         bool DeleteAllItems()
00105                 { m_stateList.Clear(); return wxListCtrl::DeleteAllItems(); }
00106 
00107         bool SortItems(wxListCtrlCompare, long)
00108                 { wxASSERT_MSG(0, wxT("Not implemented yet ! sorry... ")); return FALSE; }
00109         
00110         // shortcuts to the SetItemState function
00111         void Check(long item, bool checked);
00112         void Enable(long item, bool enable);
00113         void CheckAll(bool checked = true);
00114         void EnableAll(bool enable = true);
00115 
00116         // this needs to be redeclared otherwise it's hidden by our other Enable() function.
00117         // However you should use #EnableAll instead of this function if you want to get
00118         // good graphics (try to understand)
00119         virtual bool Enable(bool enable = true)
00120                 { return wxListCtrl::Enable(enable); }
00121 
00122         // shortcuts to the GetItemState function
00123         bool IsChecked(long item) const
00124                 { return GetItemState(item, wxLIST_STATE_CHECKED) != 0; }
00125         bool IsEnabled(long item) const
00126                 { return GetItemState(item, wxLIST_STATE_ENABLED) != 0; }
00127 
00128         // this needs to be redeclared otherwise it's hidden by our other IsEnabled() function.
00129         bool IsEnabled() const
00130                 { return wxWindow::IsEnabled(); }
00131 
00133         int GetCheckedItemCount() const;
00134 
00135         // we overload these so we are sure they will use our
00136         // #GetItem and #SetItem functions...
00137         bool SetItemState(long item, long state, long stateMask);
00138         int GetItemState(long item, long stateMask) const;
00139     long InsertItem( long index, const wxString& label, int imageIndex = -1);
00140         long SetItem(long index, int col, const wxString& label, int imageId = -1);
00141 
00142         // the image associated with an element is already in used by wxCheckedListCtrl
00143         // itself to show the checkbox and it cannot be handled by the user !
00144         bool SetItemImage(long, int)
00145                 { wxASSERT_MSG(0, wxT("This function cannot be used with wxCheckedListCtrl !")); return FALSE; }
00146 
00147 protected:              // event handlers
00148 
00149         void OnMouseEvent(wxMouseEvent& event);
00150 
00151 protected:              // internal utilities
00152 
00153         static int GetItemImageFromAdditionalState(int addstate);
00154         static int GetAndRemoveAdditionalState(long *state, int statemask);
00155         wxColour GetBgColourFromAdditionalState(int additionalstate);
